definition: Attributes that describe characteristics, preparation methods, or qualities of food and beverages.

positive_examples: This coffee has a medium roast and coarse grind.
The restaurant specializes in authentic Italian cuisine.
I prefer my steak cooked medium-rare.
The cheese is aged and has a sharp flavor.
This wine has a full-bodied taste with fruity notes.
The bread is freshly baked and still warm.
negative_examples: The chef graduated from culinary school.
Food prices have increased this year.
She works as a food critic.
The grocery store closes at 9 PM.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: LocationAttribute, TemporalAttribute, SizeAttribute, ColorAttribute, MaterialAttribute
